about.content: AI-oriented Software Engineer experienced in developing intelligent agents, robust AI safeguards, and scalable enterprise integrations. Skilled in Python and Django, with hands-on experience in Kubernetes, Vue, and AWS. Focused on integrating LLM technologies into reliable, real-world customer workflows.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed and maintained production-grade chatbot features using Django, Vue, Kubernetes, and PostgreSQL
Designed and implemented agentic AI features with OpenAIâ€™s Agents SDK to automate customer-support workflows
Strengthened safety of generated AI responses by implementing safeguards based on embedding vectors, LLM-as-a-judge and deterministic checks
Built email ticketing integrations for large enterprise customers which handle over 10.000 tickets per month

experiences.title: Backend Developer
achievements: Built the Disney+ sign-up integration and contributed to the HBO Max integration, enabling seamless partner subscription flows in our streaming platform YouTV (discontinued).
Developed backend APIs using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, S3, Python, and Terraform for YouTV and YouSee mobile

experiences.title: Python Tutor
achievements: Tutored one student in 'python for social sciences' undergrad course
The student achieved a grade of 10 on a 12 point scale

publications.title: ClipWidgets: 3D-printed Modular Tangible UI Extensions for Smartphones
publications.description: Scientific article based on MSc. thesis research about 3D printing interactive UI components for smartphones. The article was accepted and published at ACM conference TEI2022. The article was written in collaboration with Hyunyoung Kim, Carlos Tejada and Daniel Ashbrook.
